101.heading: Helga.

102.heading: Helga.

notes: Summary: Helga is staring, trying to describe Hagar.

103.heading: Helga.

103.author: Dik Browne.
notes: Summary: Snert is eating happily. Hagar comes home late, and Helga says his dinner was on the table hours ago.

104.heading: Helga.

notes: Summary: Helga talks to Hagar about his elbows being on the dinner table, and he responds by putting his feet on the table.

105.heading: "Helga Makes It All From Scratch!"* (Hagar the Horrible, Mar.

106.heading: Helga Tells It Like It Is.

220.title: "He'll Probably Be Disappointed Not to Make the Money"

notes: Summary: The boss asks Lolly to cancel his golf lesson; out at the country club the pro jumps in the air and clicks his heels together.
